name: Jordan Patel
persona: Jordan Patel is a 21-year-old Business Administration major with a CGPA of 2.68. Jordan is moderately motivated to achieve good grades and shows average perseverance and self-discipline, but sometimes struggles with staying organized and consistent in study habits. While generally able to manage test anxiety, Jordan occasionally doubts their academic abilities. Jordan is working on building better routines and seeking support to improve academic performance.
